channel.title: gristlepod store updates
channel.description: gristlepod is an illustrator and developer residing in the github hosting space. this feed records sitely updates, store news, and the like.

item.title: Preorders for Dot Ship Acrylic Charms, YCH slots
item.description: Preorders on Ko-fi for (my first) and new series of acrylic charms are now live. I've also set up a YCH commission service based on these designs.

item.title: Market Blog: Start!
item.description:
I've hoisted the beams for a new blog in regards to future product announcements as well as the convenience of my followers. Of course, for the luddites, I've tailored an RSS feed completely for you. By subscribing to this feed, you may get early updates about my newest merch designs, when the Ko-fi store page has a new item, or when I open preorders.

Thanks for checking in.
